Script.text:
#PARNAME=dstind #LOC=1,1
def connectionFunc(srclocs,dstlocs,dstind):
import math
i = 0 out = [] for srcloc in srclocs: j = 0 for dstloc in dstlocs: if j==dstind: conn = (i,j,0,0) out.append(conn) j = j + 1 i = i + 1 return out
Script.name: New Script
